item.title: Japanese neuroscience takes a turn for the worse
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
Ibanez:

My point was, why even make these? They should have made a tech demonstration with something cooler/less fucked up.

Perhaps they need to make something simpler such as that in order to fund further research for more complex applications. Also, it’s not fucked up to the Japanese. I mean really, folks. Just because it seems odd to us isn’t a good reason for us to criticize them. It’s called culture, and believe it or not they’re not all the same as yours.

Read full topic
item.source: Japanese neuroscience takes a turn for the worse

We’re screwed, guys.

One step closer to “Y: The Last Man?” Only time will tell.

item.dc:creator: Actonide
item.description:
DrasarSalman:

So the side effect of a nuclear blast is weirdness? Nobody is acting suspicious in the area Chernobyl released radiation.

https://press-f1.co.uk/2009/03/21/abandoned-clown-train/
Maybe not people, but things in chernobyl are weird anyhow (you all have to have seen this pic before).

Looks like you figured out the answer!
